      • scatter

        public void scatter(java.lang.String[] titles,
                    org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray[] matrices)
        Histograms the given matrices. This is primarily used for debugging gradients. You don't necessarily use this directly
        Parameters:
        titles - the titles of the plots
        matrices - the matrices to plot
